member.name: M:SourceCode.Clay.Text.StringBuilderExtensions.AppendFormatLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Appends a formatted string (using zero or more format items) to this instance, followed by the default line terminator.
member.returns: A reference to this instance with format appended.
